content:
Above is a list of intents and slots associated with those intents.   you'll be provided  with an utterance.
Read the text very attentively  and assign the best intent that it matches from the list above. You can choose only one intent. Also, extract all relevant slots and their values. 

All intents are provided in json format.  Each intent has its Intent Id in a alphanumeric format, intent name and description. Each slot has slot Id, slot.name and slot description, and data type.
It may also include a field of possible.values which means the slot must match one of the provided values. If any other values present in the utterance for the corresponding intent, do not extract them, set the value to "none". It could also include a field example.Values where examples are given but the extracted slots do not need to exactly match those given values.  If multiple slots are provided, fill all the slots.  If a value of slot is not provided, set the value of the slot to "none". 

I want you to give your final output as a JSON.  The JSON should always have a key “output”. The value of “output” should be a dictionary where the key of this dictionary is the intent id and the values is a subdictionary where the keys are the slot ids associated with the given intent and the values are the slot values.  

### text
I'm experiencing paper jam issues with the Epson FastFoto FF-680W located on the 3rd floor of building C in San Diego office.
